name: minions-memory-workspace
description: Persistent cross-session memory, recalled facts, and agent knowledge base
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-memory/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-memory/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-memory-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-memory-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-memory-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-memory-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-memory-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-memory-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-memory/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-memory/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-memory/cli run lint
